title: Need helt p[ identify this simple font
content:
I need this in order to translate it into another language! Very important :(

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [THIS.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819175620/http:/typophile.com/files/THIS.jpg) | 5.54 KB |
author: estyrer

comments.content: All I can say for sure is that it’s a Garamond. But there are many many Garamonds out there. And the size of your sample certainly doesn’t make it easy to identify. I wouldn’t call any Garamond a simple font btw. All that being said I’d guess it’s [Monotype Garamond](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819175620/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/garamond/).
thank you so much :) your talent is greatly appreciated
